attributes.description:
*Service history
*Very neat bakkie
*4x4
*Power steering
*Electric windows
*Clean quality cloth interior
*Cruise control
*Alloy wheels with good tyres
*LCD radio/Bluetooth audio
*Canopy
*Towbar
*Aircon
*Good power and fuel economy
*ABS/Airbags
*Many more features
*Pre delivery inspection and service before delivery
*Easy application process through all major banks
*All vehicles are hand picked and inspected.
*Best personal service in Bloemfontein
*We deliver nation wide.
*Extended warranty available

BLOEMFONTEIN MOTORS IS A FAMILY OWNED BUSINESS FOR MORE THAN 40 YEARS. WE PRIDE OURSELVES TO OFFER ONLY THE BEST HAND PICKED PRE-LOVED VEHICLES.

**PLEASE ASK FOR ME BY NAME**

Available on Whatsapp, SMS, Call, Telegram and email.

Assuring you of my best attention at all times.

Bloemfontein Motors
In God We Trust!!

150 OR Thambo Drive
Oranjesig 
Bloemfontein

Diederik Kotze
Sales Manager
diederik@bfnmotors.co.za
0711909852
0514477042
_INDIVIDUAL VEHICLE DEALS, DRIVEN BY YOU_

attributes.description:
MOTUS NISSAN & RENAULT MENLYN offers nationwide delivery to all of our valued customers as well as our very
own Finance and Insurance Manager who is ready to help with finance at our dealership
or over the phone for your CONVENIENCE in a matter of MINUTES with all 4 major banks. All of our vehicles come
with a 160-point QUALITY Check meaning they check every part of the vehicle to make sure it is
101% Roadworthy as well as 101% PERFECT just for you! Please note that the price
advertised excludes our Documentation, License and Delivery fees all at one standard
price. Test Drives and Trade Ins are most certainly welcome.

MOTUS MENLYN, where customers become friends

attributes.title: 2021 Toyota Corolla Quest 1.8 Plus

attributes.agent_name: Motus Select Hyundai Kia Renault Nelspruit
attributes.description:
Explore the less-travelled roads in space-age comfort and style.
Cruise powerfully along mountain passes, tropical coasts and winding rivers.
Discover what's around the next corner, and the next, and the next.
Find exciting new stories in unexpected places.
Do it all with smooth, assured AWD power and unrivalled safety technology.
Go the way you want, in the all-new Kia Sorento. 
Step away from the everyday and admire the design of the Kia
Sorento. With its distinctive new contours and wheel arch cladding,
body colour door handles with a touch of satin chrome, sleek trim,
and side sills, and distinctive daylight opening graphic, this car
perfectly combines on-road sophistication with off-road thrills while
at the same time producing lower emissions.
